text: (hūtu napiyuṭaiya) makkaḷukku ivvulaka vāḻkkaiyiṉ cukapōkaṅkaḷai nām koṭuttiruntum avarkaḷuṭaiya talaivarkaḷ (avaṟṟaiyum) avaraiyum nirākarittuviṭṭu maṟumaiyaic cantippataiyum poyyākki (‘hūtu' napiyai cuṭṭik kāṇpittu) ‘‘ivar uṅkaḷaip pōṉṟa oru maṉitaṉē tavira vēṟillai. Nīṅkaḷ pucippataiyē avarum pucikkiṟār; nīṅkaḷ kuṭippataiyē avarum kuṭikkiṟār
